thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 7 of 519
thread.title: MARGARET FOSTER

author: MARGARET FOSTER
title: MARGARET FOSTER
text: My order was received with one opened box and with an outdated prescription. I am disappointed that there is not a check for current prescription and even more upset that I received an open box. I was told (by phone and email) that I could return the order for a refund, but it would not include the opened box "since that's impossible" apparently. I will switch distributors.
